title: Audit the New Hire Onboarding Program
description: An operational auditor reviews the HR onboarding program to assess its effectiveness and efficiency.

tasks.description: Survey a sample of employees hired in the last 6 months to get their feedback on the onboarding experience.
tasks.expected_outcome: Survey results indicate that new hires feel unprepared for their roles after the standard one-week onboarding.

tasks.description: Review the onboarding curriculum and identify that it lacks role-specific training.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor identifies a gap in the onboarding content.

tasks.description: Recommend that HR develop role-specific training paths to be included in the onboarding program.
tasks.expected_outcome: A recommendation is made to improve the effectiveness of onboarding.
